dlg_about:
Everything remains consistent with Update V2, but potential size errors in the dialog box on various devices have been resolved in the upgraded version. It ensures smooth functionality across all devices. Click preview, then access the tutorial to comprehend implementation and visualize how it appears on diverse devices. 

Please note: In the enhanced Update V2, instead of using the version name, you must now use the version code to display the update dialog in your user app. 

Watch the tutorial for a more in-depth understanding. üî•üî•


ùóõùó∂ùòÄùòÅùóºùóøùòÜ :

22-03-2024 (Latest)
üî® Fixed title color not change
üí• Added subtitle, submessage & dialog background colour editing function
üí• Added function for changing the Dialog display position. Because of this, I removed the Bottom-sheet dialog from the server. If you have already published your app with the same dialog, you can use this dialog JSON for hosting the BottomSheet dialog as well.

28-02-2024 
üî® Fixed app crashing bug after dialog injection
üí• Added x86 and x86_64 architecture support
üí• Added new option that can help you to close user app if internet connection off. The option is "Is force Update ?"

12-01-2024 
üî® Fixed auto closing while clicking outside Dialog
üî® Fixed run time crash issue

07-01-2024 
üî• Initial release
instructions_after_patch:
Please read the instructions given in the ReadME.smali file.

If you want to patch apk directly then simply click Apk Patch

dlg_design_data_for_apply.More_Info:
If you set "CENTER" , then the dialog will appear in CENTER of your user Screen. 

If you set "BOTTOM" , then the dialog will display bottom part of the user screen..

If you set "true" for version update, the dialog will appear when your input version (from the server) doesn't match the current version of the user's installed app. 

If you set "false" for version update, the dialog will display only once.
dlg_design_data_for_apply.radioBtn1_info: As you have turned on the Version mode update you should enter version code below üëá
dlg_design_data_for_apply.radioBtn2_info:
As you turned off the version mode.. now user can see only one time the Update Dialog.. If you again Update then user will show again that dialog üëç

In version code place add any Random number but don't leave it blank alright üëç

dlg_design_data_for_apply.More_Info: Please enter version code.. not version name remember it ..Any confusion ask in group
If you set force update "true" then app will automatically exit if internet connection off

If you set "Cancel button VISIBLE," the cancel button will be displayed when you send an update to the user app. Otherwise, if you set it to "INVISIBLE," the cancel button will not appear on the user app.
dlg_design_data_for_apply.radioBtn1_info: Please add Everything in cancel button details.. Because you enable it..üëç
dlg_design_data_for_apply.radioBtn2_info: Now you have disable it.. so you can fill anything in below cancel button design.. but please input something to generate your encryted json.. remember it üëç

dlg_about:
Improved iOS Dialog with fixed UI issues and a new feature allowing you to display the dialog at specified time intervals. For example, setting it to "2" means the dialog appears every 2 minutes, and for "5," it shows up every 5 minutes.

‚ö†Ô∏è Exercise caution with short intervals, as it's a random process and may impact user experience. Consider using longer intervals like 60 or 120 minutes. Watch the video for a detailed understanding of how this differs from the standard iOS Dialog. üëç



ùóõùó∂ùòÄùòÅùóºùóøùòÜ :

09-01-2024 (Latest)
* Initial release
instructions_after_patch: Please read the instructions given in the ReadME.smali file.

dlg_design_data_for_apply.More_Info:
If you set it to "2," your dialog will consistently appear at 2-minute intervals in the user app. Similarly, if set to "60," it will display every 60 minutes.

‚ö†Ô∏è Be cautious about setting too short intervals, like 2 or 3 minutes, as it may impact the user experience.

dlg_about:
This is a very wonderful patch that can help you in earning money by playing your ads on your mod using short link earner. Simple things no rocket üöÄ science 

Direct patching is available .. But you need to add Activity code in android manifest manually after patch...(Becareful about it)

Please watch video carefully..It's my humble request üôè

ùóõùó∂ùòÄùòÅùóºùóøùòÜ :
05-03-2024(Latest)
*Added more Dialog animation functions, text Colors, stroke etc.
* Fixed bug Dialog showing again even after verification complete..
* Instead of finish Activity, now added System exit..may feel you that app crashed but it's actually not. So don't worry about that.

04-03-2024
* Added function if any third-party links are loading automatically which basically starts with "intent://" or any other name , now it may block by this project.. So consider using simple full of ads based website..
* Fixed some UI related issues..
* Performance improvement

02-03-2024
* Initial release
instructions_after_patch:
Please read all instructions that given in ReadME.smali file

If you want to patch apk directly then simply click Apk Patch. But please remember add the Activity code in AndroidManifest

dlg_design_data_for_apply.More_Info: Whether the dialog title appears in the middle or in the normal position. Normal position means from left to right or right to left (for Arabic letters).
Whether the dialog message appears in the middle or in the normal position. Normal position means from left to right or right to left (for Arabic letters).

dlg_design_data_for_apply.Dlg_Information: Set timer to show the dialog
dlg_design_data_for_apply.More_Info:
If you set it to "2," your verification dialog will consistently appear at 2-minute intervals in the user app. Similarly, if set to "60," it will display every 60 minutes.

‚ö†Ô∏è Be cautious about setting too short intervals, like 2 or 3 minutes, as it may impact the user experience.
